quote: Everyone will be famous for 15 minutes.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: I have no use for people who throw their weight around as celebrities, or for those who fawn over you just because you are famous.
name: Walt Disney

quote: What a heavy burden is a name that has become too famous.
name: Voltaire

quote: We all want to be famous people, and the moment we want to be something we are no longer free.
name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Famous, adj.: Conspicuously miserable.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Martyrdom is the only way a man can become famous without ability.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Andy Warhol made fame more famous.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: I just want to make music, I don't want people to talk about me. All I've ever wanted to do was sing. I don't want to be a celebrity. I don't want to be in people's faces, you know, constantly on covers of magazine that I haven't even known I'm on.
name: Adele

quote: It's really easy to avoid the tabloids. You just live your life and don't hang out with famous people who are in the tabloids. Don't do anything controversial and be a normal person. Have friends. And get a job and keep working.
name: Amanda Seyfried

quote: I wanted to be successful, not famous.
name: George Harrison

quote: I'm not comfortable being around too many people. I don't like being out in public too much. I don't like going to bars. I don't like doing celebrity stuff. So most of the characters I play are people who don't always feel comfortable beyond their small circle of friends.
name: Adam Sandler

quote: How many famous and high-spirited heroes have lived a day too long?
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: I like being famous when it's convenient for me and completely anonymous when it's not.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: I never wanted to be famous. I only wanted to be great.
name: Ray Charles

quote: For famous men have the whole earth as their memorial.
name: Pericles

quote: I know I'm not supposed to have any opinions about politics, because I'm famous.
name: Cher

quote: I'd rather be able to face myself in the bathroom mirror than be rich and famous.
name: Ani DiFranco

quote: You're not famous until my mother has heard of you.
name: Jay Leno

quote: It isn't necessary to be rich and famous to be happy. It's only necessary to be rich.
name: Alan Alda

quote: I always want to say to people who want to be rich and famous: 'try being rich first'. See if that doesn't cover most of it. There's not much downside to being rich, other than paying taxes and having your relatives ask you for money. But when you become famous, you end up with a 24-hour job.
name: Bill Murray

quote: There's no difference between fame and infamy now. There's a new school of professional famous people that don't do anything. They don't create anything.
name: Ricky Gervais

quote: Nothing in life prepares you to be famous.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: I can do whatever I want - I'm rich, I'm famous, and I'm bigger than you.
name: Don Johnson

quote: It is a mark of many famous people that they cannot part with their brightest hour.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: Tom Cruise, he's a lot more famous than me.
name: David Beckham

quote: People hate me because I am a multifaceted, talented, wealthy, internationally famous genius.
name: Jerry Lewis

quote: I am beautiful, famous and gorgeous.
name: Anna Kournikova

quote: A famous person to themselves, they don't get up in the morning and think, I'm famous. I'm not famous to me. Famous is a perception.
name: Van Morrison

quote: The hardest thing about being famous is that people are always nice to you. You're in a conversation and everybody's agreeing with what you're saying - even if you say something totally crazy. You need people who can tell you what you don't want to hear.
name: Al Pacino

quote: For a time, at least, I was the most famous person in the entire world.
name: Jesse Owens

quote: Fate is being kind to me. Fate doesn't want me to be too famous too young.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: Being big and famous doesn't get you more freedom, it gets you less.
name: Robert Wyatt

quote: Celebrity distorts democracy by giving the rich, beautiful, and famous more authority than they deserve.
name: Maureen Dowd

quote: I wrote because I needed to and wanted to. It never occurred to me that I'd become famous.
name: Danielle Steel

quote: Indeed, wretched the man whose fame makes his misfortunes famous.
name: Lucius Accius

quote: I put my money in the bank: I have to think of life after modeling, when I'm not famous any more.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: My story of success and failure is not just about music and being famous. It's about living and loving and trying to find purpose in this crazy world.
name: Wynonna Judd

quote: Celebrity gives us delusion of self importance.
name: Al Goldstein

quote: I've worked with a lot of people who are more famous than myself who are terribly insecure.
name: Barry Gibb

quote: But I know newspapers. They have the first amendment and they can tell any lie knowing it's a lie and they're protected if the person's famous or it's a company.
name: Steve Wozniak

quote: Celebrity, to me, is not a thing to seek.
name: Aidan Quinn

quote: The thing about being famous is, it's weird. The only people who get how weird it is are other famous people.
name: Margot Kidder

quote: You don't have to have an attitude if you're famous.
name: Adriana Lima

quote: I seek no longer to be a 'famous' person, and instead I wish to live a 'normal' life.
name: Sinead O'Connor

quote: Public misbehavior by the famous is a powerful teaching tool.
name: Bill O'Reilly

quote: When you become famous, being famous becomes your profession.
name: James Carville

quote: Acting is not about being famous, it's about exploring the human soul.
name: Annette Bening

quote: I want to be famous everywhere.
name: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: I really hate the duties of being a celebrity, like getting dressed up for the red carpet.
name: America Ferrera

quote: If there's anything more mortifying than being famous at 14, it's being washed up right after.
name: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: My favorite thing about being famous... it's not really as big of a deal as everybody says it is. Being on the road is tough, doing interviews, and all the stuff. It's still pretty tough.
name: Aaron Carter

quote: I can't see any value in being a celebrity, famous for being famous.
name: Noomi Rapace

quote: The whole celebrity culture thing - I'm fascinated by, and repelled by, and yet I end up knowing about it.
name: Anderson Cooper

quote: When I'm living in the world of luxury and celebrity, which is where I found myself for a large part of my life, it's a walk-on part. Not a vital necessity, like it is for so many people. I enjoy it but I can see right through it!
name: Agnetha Faltskog

quote: I will either be famous or infamous.
name: Otto Dix

quote: Sometimes being famous gets in the way of doing what you want to do.
name: Johnny Mathis

quote: I think that when you are famous every weakness is exaggerated.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Before I was famous, when I was just working in Gilbert's Lodge, everything was moving in slow motion.
name: Eminem

quote: Martyrdom: The only way a man can become famous without ability.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: To be famous, in fact, one has only to kill one's landlady.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Wood burns because it has the proper stuff in it and a man becomes famous because he has the proper stuff in him.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: When I started out, I didn't have any desire to be an actress or to learn how to act. I just wanted to be famous.
name: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Did you ever stop to think why cops are always famous for being dumb? Simple. Because they don't have to be anything else.
name: Orson Welles

quote: A very quiet and tasteful way to be famous is to have a famous relative. Then you can not only be nothing, you can do nothing too.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I'm bored with that line. I never use it anymore. My new line is 'In 15 minutes everybody will be famous.'
name: Andy Warhol

quote: I don't like Los Angeles. The people are awful and terribly shallow, and everybody wants to be famous but nobody wants to play the game. I'm from New York. I will kill to get what I need.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: The cool thing about being famous is traveling. I have always wanted to travel across seas, like to Canada and stuff.
name: Britney Spears

quote: My idea of a good picture is one that's in focus and of a famous person.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: In the future everyone will be famous for 15 minutes.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: After a fellow gets famous it doesn't take long for someone to bob up that used to sit by him in school.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: And to me, fame is not a positive thing. The idea of being famous is a lot better than the reality. It's fantastic when you go to premieres and people cheer you, but it's not real. And it's totally not my approach to get my name on a club door just because I can.
name: Tom Felton

quote: I served the famous professors and scholars, and eventually they learned that the Reverend Moon is superior to them. Even Nobel laureate academics who thought they were at the center of knowledge are as nothing in front of me.
name: Sun Myung Moon

quote: A chair is a very difficult object. A skyscraper is almost easier. That is why Chippendale is famous.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: If you want to be a rock star or just be famous, then run down the street naked, you'll make the news or something. But if you want music to be your livelihood, then play, play, play and play! And eventually you'll get to where you want to be.
name: Eddie Van Halen

quote: When we were growing up our parents somehow made it clear that being famous was good. And I mistakenly thought that if I was famous then everyone would love me.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I was never very interested in boys - and there were plenty of them - vying with one another to see how many famous women they would get into the hay.
name: Bette Davis

quote: Some of the most famous books are the least worth reading. Their fame was due to their having done something that needed to be doing in their day. The work is done and the virtue of the book has expired.
name: Moliere

quote: There's more pressure to be famous for being yourself than if you're being a character.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: Any idiot can get laid when they're famous. That's easy. It's getting laid when you're not famous that takes some talent.
name: Kevin Bacon

quote: Mum loves me being famous! She is so excited and proud, as she had me so young and couldn't support me, so I am living her dream, it's sweeter for both of us. It's her 40th birthday soon and I'm going to buy her 40 presents.
name: Adele

quote: The fame thing is interesting because I never wanted to be famous, and I never dreamt I would be famous.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: I imagined being a famous writer would be like being like Jane Austen.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: There is a misleading, unwritten rule that states if a quote giving advice comes from someone famous, very old, or Greek, then it must be good advice.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: If you think Abraham Lincoln became famous for inventing the town car, it is time to spend a few hours on history.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: Forget about being world famous, it's hard enough just getting the automatic doors at the supermarket to acknowledge our existence.
name: Doug Coupland

quote: Yeah, I love being famous. It's almost like being white, y'know?
name: Chris Rock

quote: What I've learned is that you really don't need to be a celebrity or have money or have the paparazzi following you around to be famous.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: I've never sat there and plotted out how I was going to become successful or famous.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: I think the driving thing was curiosity about the universe. That fascinated me. I didn't think anything about being famous or anything like that, I was just interested in the concepts involved.
name: Clyde Tombaugh

quote: We are not interested in cloning the Michael Jordans and the Michael Jacksons of this world. The rich and the famous don't participate in this.
name: Panayiotis Zavos

quote: I have a profound empathy for people who are in the public eye, whether they manifest it themselves or whether it happened by accident - it doesn't matter to me. I think there's a great misunderstanding of what it is to be famous.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: I thought the more famous I became, the more friendships I would have, but the opposite was true.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: I'm more interested in being good than being famous.
name: Annie Leibovitz

quote: Aristotle was famous for knowing everything. He taught that the brain exists merely to cool the blood and is not involved in the process of thinking. This is true only of certain persons.
name: Will Cuppy

quote: I love being famous. It's almost like being white.
name: Chris Rock

quote: Dates with actors, finally, just seemed to me evenings of shop talk. I got sick of it after a hile. So the more famous I became, the more I narrowed down my choices.
name: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Sometimes people offer you plays, they offer you parts, but they only offer it because I'm famous.
name: Chris Rock

quote: I became very famous, as a teenager, and my name and photo were splashed in all the media. They made me larger than life, so I wanted to live larger than life, and the only way to do that was to be intoxicated.
name: Cat Stevens

quote: For me, growing up, the downside of it was that as a kid you don't want to stand out. You don't want to have a famous father let alone get a job because of your famous father, you know? But I'm a product of nepotism. That's how I got my foot in the door, through my dad.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Whenever you're the child of a famous person, you get judged in odd ways because of that.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: The idea of being famous is a lot better than the reality.
name: Tom Felton

quote: I have been very happy, very rich, very beautiful, much adulated, very famous and very unhappy.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: It's interesting because people assume that because I'm famous I know all famous people.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I'm doing a new musical on Broadway, which opens in October called 'The Boy from Oz,' where I play Peter Allen. For those of you who don't know, he became first famous in America for marrying Liza Minelli.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: There were a few years there when I was just so enamored with the idea of living some sort of famous person's lifestyle that really isn't suited to me.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I think it's useful, as a famous person, to have as little separation between the perception of you and how you really are - because otherwise I'd be sitting here thinking I'm keeping secrets, and wondering when you're going to find out.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: In the sixties, everyone you knew became famous. My flatmate was Terence Stamp. My barber was Vidal Sassoon. David Hockney did the menu in a restaurant I went to. I didn't know anyone unknown who didn't become famous.
name: Michael Caine

quote: I made my living being 20 or 30 pounds heavier than the average model. And that's where I got famous.
name: Tyra Banks

quote: When I was going for my graduate degree, I decided I was going to make a feature film as my thesis. That's what I was famous for-that I had my thesis film be a feature film, which was 'You're a Big Boy Now.'
name: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: Since I was seventeen I thought I might be a star. I'd think about all my heroes, Charlie Parker, Jimi Hendrix... I had a romantic feeling about how these people became famous.
name: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quote: Other famous men, those of much talk and few deeds, soon evaporate. Action is the dignity of greatness.
name: Jose Marti

quote: Lance Armstrong, the famous cyclist and more importantly, cancer survivor, has said 'if you ever get a second chance for something, you've got to go all the way.'
name: Michael N. Castle

quote: The strangest part about being famous is you don't get to give first impressions anymore. Everyone already has an impression of you before you meet them.
name: Kristen Stewart

quote: I have no interest in Shakespeare and all that British nonsense... I just wanted to get famous and all the rest is hogwash.
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: I certainly don't think you need to be famous to want to leave a legacy, but when you are famous, it's even more likely that your child will get the wrong perspective on your life if you die prematurely.
name: Shania Twain

quote: One thing about being famous is the people around you, you pay all their bills so they very rarely disagree with you because they want you to pick up the check.
name: Charles Barkley

quote: People just assume that if you're famous, you're in Hollywood.
name: Megan Fox

quote: If you look closely, there is no book more visual than Three Trapped Tigers, in that it is filled with blank pages, dark pages, it has stars made of words, the famous magical cube made of numbers, and there is even a page which is a mirror.
name: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

quote: Among famous traitors of history one might mention the weather.
name: Ilka Chase

quote: Know the names of past and current artists who are most famous for playing their instruments.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: I think there are a lot of people who really want to be famous, they really do. I don't. It sort of gets in the way of the everyday things that I do.
name: Johnny Mathis

quote: Comedy has to be done en clair. You can't blunt the edge of wit or the point of satire with obscurity. Try to imagine a famous witty saying that is not immediately clear.
name: James Thurber

quote: Bruce Lee was very famous. I watched his movies and he is amazing. He is a martial arts master, his philosophy, his movement, both physically and mentally, were very strong.
name: Jet Li

quote: You can get rich or famous by doing the same thing.
name: Ang Lee

quote: And I want to do it the right way, like everybody else, not just a famous figurehead that gets a job because he is a famous basketball player. I want to really learn the business.
name: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: There is no fulfillment in things whatsoever. And I think one of the reasons that depression reigns supreme amongst the rich and famous is some of them thought that maybe those things would bring them happiness. But what, in fact, does is having a cause, having a passion. And that's really what gives life's true meaning.
name: Benjamin Carson

quote: I don't mean being famous is a perk, because one knows that it's not necessarily a perk, but there are certain perks to being well-known and respected in one's field. Public perks. Like, I don't know, general friendliness and willingness to please, just to point out two.
name: Emma Thompson

quote: The problem is, the more famous you get, the more people see you who didn't choose to.
name: Louis C. K.

quote: Look at Jessica Simpson. She's famous for being dumb. I guess it started with Marylyn Monroe, and she actually wasn't that dumb, but that's how she was perceived - and that's what got popular.
name: Danica McKellar

quote: Because you know when you first become famous, you start walking a little different because people are staring at you.
name: Bono

quote: Exposure makes you famous, not just good work. Famous is being plastered everywhere.
name: Francesca Annis

quote: I never pursued being 'famous.'
name: Francesca Annis

quote: I could have been a dental hygienist with nothing bad ever appearing in print about me, but that's not how I've chosen to lead my life. I knew that you put yourself under a microscope the more famous you become.
name: Julia Roberts

quote: I can't advise any of the young ones, because I don't know what their background was, but I would suggest that anyone who wants to be famous more than anything - there's a real problem.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: I'm sick to death of famous people standing up and using their celebrity to promote a cause. If I see a particular need, I do try to help. But there's a lot that can be achieved by putting a check in the right place and shutting up about it.
name: Russell Crowe

quote: Barack Obama is the most famous living person in the history of the world.
name: Dee Dee Myers

quote: Famous people come up to me, but I don't know who they are because my sight is so bad. It's always at the pool of the Four Seasons in Beverly Hills when I don't have my lenses in and my glasses are in my room.
name: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: I was famous overnight. I went from nowhere to being really big.
name: Sting

quote: The worst thing about being famous is the invasion of your privacy.
name: Justin Timberlake

quote: Hitler was so modern, in that he was obsessed with being famous. He was caught up with this rush to be have achieved greatness before turning 30.
name: John Cusack

quote: You know, I did not like being famous. It was a stressful and ugly time, and I'm glad it's over.
name: Diablo Cody

quote: To enjoy being famous, you need to have a screw loose.
name: Diablo Cody

quote: I'd probably be famous now if I wasn't such a good waitress.
name: Jane Siberry

quote: The whole 'American Idol' way of looking at things is the antithesis of what I grew up with. There are a whole lot of kids wanting to be famous now, whereas if I'd even mentioned that word to one of my teachers, I would have got into a whole load of trouble.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I became famous, I think, really because of the interpretation of other people's songs, way back when, and that's what I enjoy the most. And I'm a lazy bugger.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: There is this power that comes with being famous.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: I would have been very happy just working from job to job, paying my rent one movie at a time. I never wanted to be this famous. I never imagined this life for myself.
name: Kristen Stewart

quote: I'm willing to make compromises based on someone I think is the one, but I think it's psychologically important to people when they're famous to be the only famous person they know.
name: John Mayer

quote: I just like the company of beautiful women. I have a weakness in that department. And I suppose because I am fairly well off and a famous musician, I'm up for grabs. And that makes me an eligible bachelor in the press.
name: Eric Clapton

quote: In the beginning, I loved being famous, but now I am tired of it and I would like to go back to my freedom.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: There's a definite responsibility that comes with being famous. You shouldn't be able to just dress up and look pretty.
name: Rashida Jones

quote: I have to say, you know, I've seen so many people go through the cycle and become famous and not famous anymore and, you know, want - have their priorities change and want different things.
name: Rashida Jones

quote: I woke up one morning to find I was famous. I bought a white Rolls-Royce and drove down Sunset Boulevard, wearing dark specs and a white suit, waving like the Queen Mum.
name: Peter O'Toole

quote: My mom just didn't put a very high premium on me being like really famous or really wealthy or anything.
name: Martha Plimpton

quote: I'm not one of those famous people flying round the world emoting over every catastrophe. I'm too feeble.
name: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: The first time I went to Johnny Depp's house in LA is when I realized what I was getting myself into. I knew he was famous, but I didn't really know what that entailed.
name: Kate Moss

quote: Duke Ellington was famous for hs very original harmonic patterns.
name: Lawrence Welk

quote: Why am I so famous? What am I doing right? What are the others doing wrong?
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: Being famous is just like being in high school. But I'm not interested in being the cheerleader. I'm not interested in being Gwen Stefani. She's the cheerleader, and I'm out in the smoker shed.
name: Courtney Love

quote: The fire in the belly is essential, otherwise you become Michael Buble - famous and meaningless.
name: Steven Patrick Morrissey

quote: I kept saying that I'd never live in L.A., and I didn't think I would. But that's where the work is, and I ended up making a lot of friends there, and my old friends moved out to Los Angeles too. And also, I think when you're famous, its hard to live in a small town.
name: John Cusack

quote: I lost some of my friends because I got so famous, people who just assumed that I would be different now. I felt like everyone hated me. That is the most unhappy time of my life.
name: Haruki Murakami

quote: Who elected Larry King America's grief counselor? We, the viewing public, did, by driving up his ratings whenever somebody famous passes.
name: James Wolcott

quote: I have a great job writing for 'The Office,' but, really, all television writers do is dream of one day writing movies. I'll put it this way: At the Oscars the most famous person in the room is, like, Angelina Jolie. At the Emmys the huge exciting celebrity is Bethenny Frankel. You get what I mean.
name: Mindy Kaling

quote: It took me fifteen years to discover I had no talent for writing, but I couldn't give it up because by that time I was too famous.
name: Robert Benchley

quote: I know I'm not a self-indulgent idiot I also know I'm not the second coming of Deepak Chopra. If I had believed either of those, or both, as some people do when they get famous, that's when the mental illness arrives.
name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: I know it's a cliche but I never wanted to be famous. I don't believe anybody wants to be famous.
name: Jeremy Renner

quote: A lot of people these days are not music lovers - they just want to be famous which is a very different thing to what I grew up believing in.
name: Shirley Manson

quote: The love of the famous, like all strong passions, is quite abstract. Its intensity can be measured mathematically, and it is independent of persons.
name: Susan Sontag

quote: I don't go to premieres. I don't go to parties. I don't covet the Oscar. I don't want any of that. I don't go out. I just have dinner at home every night with my kids. Being famous, that's a whole other career. And I haven't got any energy for it.
name: Gary Oldman

quote: You aren't famous until my mother has heard of you.
name: Jay Leno

quote: My hair was famous before I was.
name: Christopher Walken

quote: I'm English. Our dentistry is not world famous.
name: Christian Bale

quote: Just because you're not famous, doesn't mean you're not good.
name: Laura Linney

quote: I hear the way people talk about the children of famous people. They're not treated very well. The presumptions are usually quite awful. So I tried to establish myself with a couple of movies. After 'Juno' I thought: 'I think I've defined myself enough as my own director that I'd love to work with my father.'
name: Jason Reitman

quote: I've been very, very lucky in my career, in my life - from day one. When aspiring directors say, 'What's your advice?' first I say, 'Be born the son of a famous director. It's invaluable.'
name: Jason Reitman

quote: I have so much empathy for these young actors that are 19 and all of a sudden they're beautiful and famous and rich. I'm like, 'Oh my God, I'd be dead.'
name: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quote: They saw me, those reckless seekers of beauty, and in a night I was famous.
name: Lillie Langtry

quote: Now, we believe that the majority of teachers in America know our system must be reformed, to put students first so that America can compete, that teachers don't teach to become rich or famous. They teach because they love children.
name: Chris Christie

quote: The stones themselves are thick with history, and those cats that dash through the alleyways must surely be the ghosts of the famous dead in feline disguise.
name: Erica Jong

quote: Well I would say that we're regular people first of all and we're normal and it's obvious by some of the things that have happened just because our name is famous we're not immune to tragedy.
name: Brett Favre

quote: A library, to modify the famous metaphor of Socrates, should be the delivery room for the birth of ideas - a place where history comes to life.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: It's quite a famous story that takes place on Christmas Eve, and the Germans, French, and Scottish are trying to make peace one night and they bury their dead and they play football. I play a German opera singer, in German, which I never have so I am really excited about that.
name: Diane Kruger

quote: I'm not a very good impersonator, my friends maybe, but not famous people.
name: Diane Kruger

quote: It wasn't glamorous in my day. In the regions, reporters were seen as such low life that they didn't merit their name in the Radio Times. Now people are interested in being famous. I never gave it a thought.
name: Kate Adie

quote: I never dreamt of being a musician for my livelihood. I certainly never would have wanted to be in the business that I'm in, meaning the fame and the glory, the glitter, the rock star, the famous part.
name: Eddie Van Halen

quote: I'm as famous as I want to be.
name: Tracey Ullman

quote: Computers are famous for being able to do complicated things starting from simple programs.
name: Seth Lloyd

quote: The Bronx is famous for two things. Hip-hop, and 26 world championships.
name: Kurtis Blow

quote: I wanted to be famous. I wanted people to talk about me.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: I know I have this level of celebrity, of fame, international, national, whatever you want to call it, but it's a pretty surreal thing to think sometimes that you're in the middle of another famous person's life and you think to yourself, 'How the hell did I get famous? What is this some weird club that we're in?'
name: Kevin Costner

quote: Fact is, famous people say fame stinks because they love it so - like a secret restaurant or holiday island they don't want the hoi polloi to get their grubby paws on.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: Yeah, I like to be the maker of the art. And I like and want the money. But I don't really dig being famous.
name: Liz Phair

quote: Be very clear as to what your dream is. Nowadays it is fairly certain that 90 percent of all actors really just want to be rich and famous as the solution to all that ails.
name: Dirk Benedict

quote: I'm famous today. People like me today. Might not like me tomorrow. You can't count on it.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: I'm glad that my parents missed one thing that was really unbelievable. They saw me hit this great success. It was a blast and we had a lot of laughs. And it was just an amazing time. They passed away. And then after I got, you know, famous, all these haters came out of nowhere.
name: Dane Cook

quote: As a famous person you think how you're gonna end it, get away and have a normal life.
name: Gwen Stefani

quote: If I wasn't even famous or had any success, I would still wake up and put tons of make-up on, and put on a cool outfit. That's always been who I've been my whole life, so that's never gonna change. I love fashion. I love getting dressed up. I love Halloween, too.
name: Gwen Stefani

quote: There is less pressure as a character actor. It generally means that you will be acting for all of your life, which is my intention. It is not my intention to just be a rich and famous person, that would be pretty boring.
name: Tim Roth

quote: I felt so painfully isolated that I vowed I would get revenge on the world by becoming a famous cartoonist.
name: Robert Crumb

quote: I really don't know anything else because my brothers were famous when I was two years old. So I know nothing else, no other life.
name: Janet Jackson

quote: If somebody for some reason, for music or for movie, becomes famous, it's because they have something, something special.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: The press attack people to sell more papers without thinking, but when you get famous you have to put up with this kind of stuff.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: There are people who appear in the magazines and I don't know who they are. I've never seen anything they've done and their careers are over already. They're famous for maybe 10 minutes. Real careers, I think, take a long time to unfold.
name: Matt Damon

quote: I've only ever wanted to be a singer I never wanted to be famous.
name: Katherine Jenkins

quote: Because I think in order to get famous you have to be known for something. Like 'You're the romantic comedy girl' or 'You're the Oscar-winning whatever girl.'
name: Rachel Weisz

quote: Our top story tonight: Famous TV dolphin flipper was arrested today on prostitution ring charges. He allegedly was seen transporting two 16 year olds across state line for immoral porpoises.
name: Colin Mochrie

quote: I never wanted to be a celebrity I never wanted to be famous. And in my daily life, I work really hard to not trade on it in any way.
name: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: I mean I was famous for nothing.
name: Rick Springfield

quote: I didn't want kids to think that to be happy, they had to be famous or rich or live in the big city.
name: Dan Savage

quote: Becoming famous is a strange thing in your own right.
name: Carnie Wilson

quote: When you see a fantastic colour or cut in a magazine, perched up on some famous so-and-so's head, it's tempting to ask your stylist for the same, but do not be fooled. The hair in those fancy photos can be very high maintenance.
name: Beth Ditto

quote: I don't feel famous and I didn't want my autobiography to be like a Paris Hilton story.
name: Beth Ditto

quote: I always loved working as an actress, but I didn't understand why I couldn't just opt out of being famous. And then I realized you can, and I think I did. And eventually, I came to understand that you can do that and also keep working.
name: Debra Winger

quote: I would like to prove that on TV, everyday lives can be as compelling as the life-styles of the rich and famous. Especially lives that we catch at extraordinary moments.
name: Jane Pauley

quote: I would be a huge hypocrite if I didn't tell you that at one time in my life I thought the way that you made music was you got on a major label and you got famous.
name: Neko Case

quote: We need to teach our kids, because there is such a celebrity culture at the moment, that however rich you are, however famous you are, however glamorous you are, everyone has to live by the same rules.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: I don't have many famous friends, really, except Simon Cowell.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: Usually when I see someone famous, for some reason, I think I know them.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: My goal was just to work regularly. I didn't ever expect to be rich or famous. I wanted to be a working character actor.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: I got the famous Oprah hug!
name: Taylor Lautner

quote: There are hundreds of Frank Lloyd Wright buildings around the United States and in other countries, too. Wright lived into his 90s, and one of his most famous buildings, the Guggenheim Museum in New York, was completed just before his death. Wright buildings look like Wright buildings - that is their paradox.
name: Jane Smiley

quote: I became famous so quickly and so young - it was daunting. I was immature and I used to say some really stupid things in interviews. I never smiled on stage so I looked really serious, but it was because I hated my teeth and was incredibly nervous.
name: Gary Numan

quote: There's the famous thing that the A&ampR man from the record company is supposed to do: He's supposed to come into the studio and listen to the songs you've been recording and then say, 'Guys, I don't hear any singles.' And then everybody falls into a terrible depression because you have to write one.
name: Jarvis Cocker

quote: I think basically becoming famous has taken the place of going to Heaven in modern society, hasn't it? That's the place where your dreams will come true. It's an act of faith now they think that's going to sort things out.
name: Jarvis Cocker

quote: As a shy kid growing up in Sheffield, I fantasized about how it would be great to be famous so I wouldn't actually have to talk to people and feel awkward. And of course, as we all know from fairy stories, when you achieve that ambition, you find out you don't want it.
name: Jarvis Cocker

quote: Pulp existed for 12 years before we got famous. Now, you could say that was just lack of imagination, but it's some kind of quality isn't it? Tenacity. You could also say it was sloth.
name: Jarvis Cocker

quote: I had no desire to be famous I just wanted to make the greatest music ever made. I didn't want anyone to know who I was.
name: Robert Smith

quote: I don't want to be famous. I want to be secure. I don't want the world. I just want a piece of it. I want people to remember Eric Davis.
name: Eric Davis

quote: You do not want to get married at 22! Especially if you're famous, because girls are going to be throwing themselves at you.
name: Usain Bolt

quote: When you look at Michael Jackson, there's nobody who loves him in that family, nobody. If they did, they'd tell him he didn't have to do all that in order to be famous. All he has to do is keep doing his music and be himself. Michael's been a little touched for about 20 years, but somebody needs to pull him aside and tell him they love him.
name: Jamie Foxx

quote: When I was growing up, I thought I'd be a lot happier if I was famous and successful and if I had money.
name: Russell Brand

quote: I don't know if this is the kind of retrospective analysis that people are fond of applying to their work or actions, but it feels like I knew I was going to be famous and I knew that an element of that would be traumatic, so that if I could make myself something big and otherworldly, it would be a kind of defence.
name: Russell Brand

quote: Being a famous actress may give you a sense of being important, but believe me, it's just an illusion.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: It's never been my purpose to become an American icon, or more famous or richer.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: I didn't get hugely famous really quick. It was a slow, gradual process, so I was able to sort of grow into myself and figure out who I was and what I wanted without the glaring spotlight on me telling me who I was.
name: Sarah McLachlan

quote: Major success feels a bit like a coronation. Like I'd become a king. I was one of the most famous people in the world, loved and hated in equal measure. I couldn't see anything bad with it. It made me a happy person.
name: Larry Hagman

quote: I'm the man that made wrestling famous.
name: Hulk Hogan

quote: I've had to deal, a lot, with my own sense of intimidation at meeting famous people - especially actors, but really any famous people.
name: Charlie Kaufman

quote: It is more interesting to be compared to someone famous, because it lets you gauge what perceptions people have about your appearance.
name: Arthur Smith

quote: Nobody wants to end up super rich and famous - but divorced. I'm always clear on that and try to stay on the right side of the line.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: When famous people come up to you it's a bit weird, but it's an honour, really, when they recognise you and want to chat to you for a bit.
name: Wayne Rooney

quote: I was very famous as a young man and I celebrated both the good and bad times with drinking.
name: Glenn Hughes

quote: But I didn't ask to have somebody nose around in my private life. I didn't even ask to be famous. All I asked was to be able to earn a living making people laugh.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: You can become famous but you can't become unfamous. You can become infamous but not unfamous.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: Being famous is great, it's not like bad or horrible or anything.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: I love being famous - it's phenomenal.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: Being famous is not something that would make me feel successful - unless one was striving for mediocrity.
name: William Hurt

quote: There are a lot of good things about being famous but there are a few not so good things too.
name: Sharon Stone

quote: I hope this doesn't sound pompous but I don't think of myself as famous, whatever fame I've got has come through what I've done and associations of things I've done.
name: Peter Cushing

quote: You meet people in Hollywood that are famous, and you're not sure what they got famous for.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: In a school where everyone is famous or rich or whatever, you have a culture, 'What does your dad do?' 'What does your mom do?'
name: Cynthia Nixon

quote: I think in the end, when you're famous, people like to narrow you down to a few personality traits. I think I've just become this ambitious, say-whatever's-on-her-mind, intimidating person. And that's part of my personality, but it's certainly not anywhere near the whole thing.
name: Madonna Ciccone

quote: A lot of times on tour it's about, 'OK, where am I today? Wow, I'm in Costa Rica. What is their famous dish?' And it's about trying the food, and really experiencing it.
name: Fergie

quote: I'm famous for splurging at fast-food places. I'm currently obsessed with Taco Bell's bean and cheese burritos with extra green sauce and extra cheese. Gluttony!
name: Fergie

quote: You can be famous for a lot of things. You can be a Nobel-prize winner. You can be the fattest guy in the world.
name: Evel Knievel

quote: I know somebody from university who's called Phil Collins and I think there's something terribly unfortunate about sharing a name With somebody who either is famous or becomes famous.
name: David Walliams

quote: I've noticed that once you leave London you do kind of become a bit more famous. People in London are a bit too cool for school. It's not so unusual to see someone from London in the street. But outside of London people are a bit more excited to see you and come out and support you.
name: David Walliams

quote: I don't have famous neighbours and if I did, I'd avoid them. I don't live the jet-set.
name: Vanessa Paradis

quote: People don't get through to the essence of you right away - it's always the famous 'girl' or the famous 'girlfriend'. I'd rather be known for myself.
name: Vanessa Paradis

quote: What is a movie star? It is an illusion. It was everything I ever wanted to be, but it became a kind of shell, non? It was what made me famous and got me women. But it wasn't real.
name: Jean Claude Van Damme

quote: You know, one of the biggest thrills I have is when famous people recognize me from Taxi.
name: Marilu Henner

quote: Anytime you cast a movie and you need someone famous in the lead part, you're a prisoner of whoever happens to be famous in the six-month window in which you're trying to get a film financed.
name: Alexander Payne

quote: When you're rich and famous you are the dominant force in a relationship, even if you try hard not to be. I've talked of sacrificing everything for Fleetwood Mac, but I realize now that it is simply the only thing I've ever wanted to do.
name: Stevie Nicks

quote: I just think Rosa Parks was overrated. Last time I checked, she got famous for breaking the law.
name: Stephen Colbert

quote: It wasn't being an alcoholic - it was going wild. It happened when I got famous. It was like having my teens in my early thirties: blotting out your life, not having to think about anything.
name: Julie Walters

quote: I remember Michael saying, 'Rich and famous? It's much better to be just rich'. I didn't quite get it to begin with. But he's right. You lose anonymity. I say to my family that you've no idea until you lose it how precious anonymity is.
name: Julie Walters

quote: I want to thank all the women who have worn my clothes, the famous and the unknown, who have been so faithful to me and given me so much joy.
name: Yves Saint Laurent

quote: It was deeply important for me to understand where Mandela came from. Because we know where he was going, and that's a famous story, but who was he? Where did he come from? What was his upbringing?
name: Idris Elba

quote: I had a sense of who I was before I got famous.
name: Joe Rogan

quote: I really feel like it's a travesty to make a child famous. I really do.
name: Joe Rogan

quote: Being famous hasn't changed my perception of myself - I've just grown up.
name: Cat Deeley

quote: I have never wanted to be famous, as such - fame is a by-product.
name: Steve Coogan

quote: Actually, bizarrely, in America, I get more appreciation from the odd, unusual stuff I've done, almost because I'm not, if you like, famous in America as I am in England.
name: Steve Coogan

quote: You've got certain guys that just want to be famous and then you've got the real musicians that just love playing music.
name: Zakk Wylde

quote: Save your rejections so that later when you are famous you can show them to people and laugh.
name: Meg Cabot

quote: HBO is really famous for hiring good people and staying out of their way until they ask for help, or need it. And that reputation is earned.
name: Richard Russo

quote: Ever since grammar school, I knew I wanted to be famous - I always wanted to be a singer.
name: Jennifer Hudson

quote: Being famous is wicked. But it's better to be normal.
name: Rupert Grint

quote: None of my characters are rich or famous, and the situations they find themselves in could happen to anyone.
name: Nicholas Sparks

quote: You know, be an actor because you love to act. Don't be an actor because you think you're going to get famous, because that's luck.
name: Whoopi Goldberg

quote: I'm actually about as famous as a fourth division footballer from the 70s.
name: Dylan Moran

quote: I didn't know what to expect from a famous movie star maybe that he'd be sort of stuck-up, you know. But not Gary Cooper. He horsed around so much... that I had a hard time painting him.
name: Norman Rockwell

quote: I don't really consider myself to be famous.
name: Victoria Justice

quote: I was obsessed with being rich and famous.
name: Paul Lynde

quote: Luckily, I think, I never really wanted to be famous, I just wanted to make movies.
name: Seth Rogen

quote: I remember, when I was an up-and-coming comic, how annoyed I would be when the famous guys would show up and just take everyone's spots.
name: Seth Rogen

quote: The good thing about L.A. is that there's always someone more famous 100 yards away from me.
name: Seth Rogen

quote: Exploitation films were famous for taking an issue an exploiting it because they could move much faster than a studio could. If there was any hot topic, they would run out and make a quick movie and make a buck on it, by changing it around and using it, in some way, to give some relevance.
name: Robert Rodriguez

quote: The people I want are very famous and very rich, and all I can offer them is a bit of exposure on TV and a bit of cash, so it's a miracle we get any guests at all. But we have been very lucky.
name: Graham Norton

quote: I met a lot of famous people when I was about 24. And none of them seemed very appealing. And so I didn't know why I would struggle to be that kind of person.
name: Ethan Hawke

quote: I think that as soon as you think of yourself as a famous person or anything like that, you're objectifying yourself in some weird way.
name: Ethan Hawke

quote: Some people want fame, popularity and huge sales. I've always hoped to have a really long career. So I've tried to make each of my creative decisions and business decisions to allow for longevity. As a side effect I got really famous and really big. I didn't realize the two could go together.
name: Jewel

quote: For now I'm just enjoying being a mom. I don't want to be more famous and more rich. I want to be a good mom.
name: Jewel

quote: No one can train you to be famous. How do you deal with the loss of anonymity, the loss of privacy? You have to be disciplined.
name: Wesley Snipes

quote: I never wanted to be the most famous, the most beautiful, the most extravagant.
name: Manolo Blahnik

quote: It's always a little mind-boggling to realize that these famous actors know who I am.
name: Emily Blunt

quote: I think that once you open the door and allow people in on a certain aspect, it's very hard to then control how far that ripple effect is. So I think that the person who is known or famous has the ability to decide what they do or don't want to share.
name: Rosie O'Donnell

quote: I definitely wanted to be an actor. I didn't want to be on TV, I didn't want to be famous, I didn't want to be anyone in particular I just wanted to do it. I see young people now who look at magazines, or American Idol and their goal is to have that lifestyle - to have good handbags, or go out with cute guys from shows, or whatever. But I definitely wanted to be an actor.
name: Lauren Graham

quote: I'm not famous for my back story investigations I'm lucky that I work with good writers and it's usually in the script.
name: Bill Nighy

quote: I know really, really famous people who are terrified every time they walk on to a stage.
name: Bill Nighy

quote: Don't worry about writing a book or getting famous or making money. Just lead an interesting life.
name: Michael Morpurgo

quote: I walk the streets, take the train, it's real simple. Some actors create their own mythology: 'Oh, I'm so famous I can't go places, because I created this mythology that I'm so famous I can't go places.'
name: Samuel L. Jackson

quote: My wife Elizabeth and I started The Really Terrible Orchestra for people like us who are pretty hopeless musicians who would like to play in an orchestra. It has been a great success. We give performances we've become the most famous bad orchestra in the world.
name: Alexander McCall Smith

quote: The records of adopted children are sealed in California. That seal is considered inviolable... The judge ruled that, because I was famous, he didn't have the same rights as other kids.
name: Danielle Steel

quote: People are much more inclined to believe and say bad things about you if you're famous.
name: Danielle Steel

quote: I never wanted to do biography just to tell the life of a famous man. I always wanted to use the life of a man to examine political power, because democracy shapes our lives.
name: Robert Caro

quote: I could have been more famous if I did all the glitzy things, but celebrity always seemed so unnecessary.
name: Enya

quote: I'd love to live in Ireland but I'd like to live as me, not what someone thinks I am. People don't understand - I lived there before I was famous.
name: Van Morrison

quote: Being famous was extremely disappointing for me. When I became famous it was a complete drag and it is still a complete drag.
name: Van Morrison

quote: Our most famous writers are Faulkner and Eudora Welty and Flannery O'Connor. It would make sense that the poetry would reflect some of those same values, some of the same techniques.
name: Robert Morgan

quote: Quite often I can be in a bookshop, standing beneath a great big picture of myself and paying for a book with a credit card clearly marked John Grisham, yet no one recognises me. I often say I'm a famous author in a country where no one reads.
name: John Grisham

quote: The hardest thing about being famous is that people are always nice to you.
name: Robert De Niro

quote: I've been accustomed to being famous and having a certain level of attention for 14 years, but in the last few months, it's changed. It's like on the arcade game, I've gone up to the next level.
name: Kylie Minogue

quote: I literally was famous before I knew my own name.
name: Corey Feldman

quote: My discrepancy with children in the industry is that they are made famous before they know who they are as human beings.
name: Corey Feldman

quote: It's more important for me to feel content than to be famous.
name: Samantha Morton

quote: I don't think I'll ever feel as famous or as popular as I felt when I was a 17-year-old soccer player in Modle. Only about 20,000 people live there and 12,000 of them come to every game. Running onto the pitch each week was just the most fantastic feeling. Nothing can beat that.
name: Jo Nesbo

quote: I get very nervous around famous people and I get nervous around beautiful women.
name: Liev Schreiber

quote: I certainly don't want a child of mine to be famous, or anyone I was very close to who isn't yet... It's the worst thing to be trapped in your house not be able to leave.
name: Elizabeth Hurley

quote: Nobody makes bouillabaisse from scratch. It's all a bunch of malarkey. Even the restaurants buy a commercial-grade product. I had a very famous chef tell me that.
name: Sandra Lee

quote: I feel very strong as an individual, but as a famous footballer I know I am prone to certain things. All the media have a continuous interest for me. It varies from once a year to every day interest.
name: Ruud van Nistelrooy

quote: There aren't many downsides to being rich, other than paying taxes and having relatives asking for money. But being famous, that's a 24 hour job right there.
name: Bill Murray

quote: When I was younger, I used to say, One day I'll be famous.
name: Katie Price

quote: For me, getting comfortable with being famous was hard - that whole side of it, the loss of anonymity, the loss of privacy. Giving up that part of your life and not having control of it.
name: Michelle Pfeiffer

quote: I married a pretty famous girl, and when we drive through town there's usually a car following us, when I walk out of my front door in Chelsea there's six guys waiting for me.
name: Kevin Pietersen

quote: First of all, plain and simple, you have no real idea of what it means to be famous until you become famous. It's a double-edged sword. Obviously there are a lot of amazing things about fame, but there are also a lot of challenging things about it.
name: Michelle Pfeiffer

quote: The only reason I became the singer in the band is because I sang the best. It wasn't out of some desire to be a star or be a famous singer. It's not like I love interviews.
name: Adam Levine

quote: Famous people feel that they must perpetually be on the crest of the wave, not realising that it is against all the rules of life. You can't be on top all the time, it isn't natural.
name: Olivia De Havilland

quote: When I was 24, I was full of life. I was that ham who wanted to be famous, a movie star, all that stuff. I think it's cool. But it was not what I was searching for, really. It was more a delusion.
name: Jean Claude Van Damme

quote: There has been a time on earth when poets had been young and dead and famous - and were men. But now the poet as the tragic child of grandeur and destiny had changed. The child of genius was a woman, now, and the man was gone.
name: Tom Wolfe

quote: I'd had people say, 'You'll enjoy being famous for a week, and you'll never enjoy it again'. But I don't think I had that week. I may have been working and missed that moment.
name: Matt Damon

quote: Sometimes I like to play the soundtracks to famous musicals so we can all sing along. South Pacific is one of my favorites. Our neighbors must hate us.
name: Louise Brown

quote: Famous pivot stories are often failures but you don't need to fail before you pivot. All a pivot is is a change is strategy without a change in vision. Whenever entrepreneurs see a new way to achieve their vision - a way to be more successful - they have to remain nimble enough to take it.
name: Eric Ries

quote: What makes the Stones' arrogance so divine is that we all believe that long ago and far away they weren't rich and famous but poor and struggling, just like us.
name: Jon Landau

quote: Some of the things I've seen a lot of my female-actress friends who are relatively famous receive - I've seen some hideous things. Like some really, really bad things... like, the FBI should be contacted immediately.
name: Elisha Cuthbert

quote: I don't want to end up being a circus act, doing my most famous tricks when I'm 70.
name: Pharrell Williams

quote: I'm not in the business of becoming famous. And that's the advice I give to younger aspiring actors. Work onstage and do the little roles. In the end it's not important to be seen. It's important to do. There's a lot of disappointment in this business, but my family keeps me grounded.
name: Kristen Bell

quote: Face it, I didn't become famous until I took my clothes off.
name: Jude Law

quote: You want a hero in the music world? James Brown. He brought a feeling to music without really using words. He's just famous for his sound.
name: David Lee Roth

quote: Being in 'Us Weekly' does not make you famous.
name: Bradley Cooper

quote: It's funny - nowadays people that are famous get chased by paparazzi. They have this fame, but they don't have the money to hide from it.
name: Matt LeBlanc

quote: I think being famous is more of a hindrance, a constraint, than just letting yourself be free.
name: Martin Yan

quote: A lot of stand-up comedy guys, when they get a little famous, just give up their stand-up career, and it cancels out the thing that set them apart.
name: Johnny Knoxville

quote: I would love to do a biopic of a famous singer, like Diana Ross or Donna Summer, or an old jazz story that we haven't seen before. I would love to do that! I would love to play Diana Ross 'cause she's an icon. I'm salivating to do that.
name: Taraji P. Henson

quote: I can't imagine wanting to be famous just for the sake of being famous. I think fame should come along with success, talent.
name: Kat Dennings

quote: Quite frankly, I didn't become an actor to become a movie star. I have never dreamed about being the most famous person on the planet. I just want to do really good work.
name: Anne Hathaway

quote: That the work involved, the willingness to take chances, the commitment, the opportunity to get on stage and make people happy, was more important than becoming famous, or even what I was dancing.
name: Suzanne Farrell

quote: I'm world famous, everywhere I go there are people who love me because of I've been able to bring them some joy from the movies I've made.
name: Tony Curtis

quote: There are high spots in all of our lives and most of them have come about through encouragement from someone else. I don't care how great, how famous or successful a man or woman may be, each hungers for applause.
name: George Matthew Adams

quote: After 'Skins' I became mildly famous, which was a bit of a disaster.
name: Nicholas Hoult

quote: I'm coming out with a wine... I'm actually a restaurateur. I have Famous Famiglia Pizzeria that has opened up in the Sacramento airport. I'm also working with my business partner on opening up the Linnethia Lounge.
name: NeNe Leakes

quote: Few would argue that Richard Dawkins is the world's most famous atheist, especially now that his friend and rival for the title, Christopher Hitchens, has now gone to meet his Maker.
name: Ray Comfort

quote: I wanted to go hide. I wasn't looking to be more famous, I'm famous enough.
name: Howard Stern

quote: I also want to go to an Italian island and do cuisine properly with some famous Italian chef and, like, his mother.
name: Elizabeth Olsen

quote: I never wanted to be famous.
name: Dave Attell

quote: I get recognized, but I'm not really a famous famous.
name: Dave Attell

quote: Once you're famous you can't go back.
name: Matthew Morrison

quote: I wanted to be a political science professor and go to school in Boston. I never wanted to be a big, famous movie star and TV star. It kind of found me.
name: Eliza Dushku

quote: To be famous and broke is hard.
name: David Spade

quote: I've always had confidence. Before I was famous, that confidence got me into trouble. After I got famous, it just got me into more trouble.
name: Bruce Willis

quote: At last, in 1611, was made, under the auspices of King James, the famous King James version and this is the great literary monument of the English language.
name: Lafcadio Hearn

quote: I was always obsessed with being famous. I had Marilyn Monroe paper dolls as a child, and I was always obsessed with her. I've just been really driven in that direction, and none of my friends were. So, I don't know what put that bug in me at a young age.
name: Holly Madison

quote: You do now have one in three people, as shown by the famous Carlton Monarchy debate poll, saying they want to get rid of the Monarchy. That was unthinkable even three, four years ago.
name: Anthony Holden

quote: Yeah, people following me down the street and at the airport and all that. I can't imagine what it must be like for people who are, you know, actually famous.
name: Ellen Page

quote: At first, I thoroughly enjoyed being famous.
name: Phil Donahue

quote: I follow the most random people on Twitter. I follow famous people like Khloe Kardashian, who surprisingly makes really funny tweets all the time.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: A lot of people are like, 'So you want to be famous.' And I'm like, 'No, I want to be good at my craft. I don't care about fame, I don't care if I even ever make it. As long as people know what I am as an actress in this business, I'm set for my career right now.'
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: I don't feel famous.
name: Uma Thurman

quote: When I got into the music industry, I wasn't focused on being the most famous artist or even getting a major record deal. It was just to make music on my own terms or create my own image, do my own hair, do my own makeup.
name: Janelle Monae

quote: The F-word is 'famous,' the C-word is 'celebrity' and S-word is 'star,' in my book. The other three words are fine - you can say those. But 'famous,' 'celebrity' and 'star,' I think, are misused.
name: Shailene Woodley

quote: I don't need to be wildly famous for my life to make sense.
name: Cory Monteith

quote: Once you become famous, there is nothing left to become but infamous.
name: Don Johnson

quote: You don't become a chef to become famous.
name: Eric Ripert

quote: Maya Angelou, the famous African American poet, historian, and civil rights activist who is hailed be many as one of the great voices of contemporary literature, believes a struggle only makes a person stronger.
name: Michael N. Castle
